DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":2,"WidgetRows":14,"WidgetColumns":24,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
	select	ucdd.Company as Companies,
			ucdd.Division as Divisions,
			ucdd.Department as Departments
	from	SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
	where	ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
)
select 	d.CreatedBy as UserId, 
		u.[Name] as [User], 
		u.[HasImage] as UserHasImage,
		e.Subject as Name,
		p.[Name] as Project, 
		convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) as Date,
		cc.Name as Client,
		cc.HasImage as ClientHasImage,
		cc.Oid as ClientId
from [CommercialClient] cc, CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [Event] e
on d.[Oid] = e.[Oid]
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
full join Project p
on p.[Oid] = d.Project
left join [User] u
on u.[Oid] = d.CreatedBy
where 	cc.Oid = d.Client and
		(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5)and
		d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 5) and 
		d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 0) and
		((u.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')) and
		((u.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')) and
		((u.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'))
		and u.Company = cup.Companies
		and u.Division = cup.Divisions
		and u.Department = cup.Departments
order by d.AgreedDate","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":17,"WidgetYPosition":16,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":7,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
	select	ucdd.Company as Companies,
			ucdd.Division as Divisions,
			ucdd.Department as Departments
	from	SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
	where	ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
)
select IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as TomorrowToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as TomorrowDone
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
        and d.Company = cup.Companies
		and d.Division = cup.Divisions
		and d.Department = cup.Departments","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Configuration: {"stateStoring":{"enabled":false},"width":"120","height":"83","searchPanel":{"visible":false},"columnChooser":{"enabled":false},"onToolbarPreparing":"null","export":{"enabled":false},"groupPanel":{"visible":false},"grouping":{"autoExpandAll":false},"selection":{"mode":"single"},"scrolling1":{"mode":"virtual","rowRenderingMode":"virtual"},"sorting":{"mode":"none"},"allowColumnReordering":"true","rowAlternationEnabled":"true","showBorders":false,"columns":[{"caption":"Tomorrow","headerCellTemplate":"function(e, i) { SW.setAttribute(e, i.column.caption, 'style', 'background-color: rgb(126, 200, 128); color: white; border-radius: 4px; line-height: 33px; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700'); }","alignment":"center","cellTemplate":"function(e, i) {                 var toDo = i.data['TomorrowToDo'];                var done = i.data['TomorrowDone'];                var aux = done + ' / ' + toDo;                SW.setAttribute(e, aux, 'style', 'font-size: 15px; font-weight: 700')    }"}]}

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":9,"WidgetYPosition":20,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":7,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (

			ucdd.Division as Divisions,

full join [WorkflowState] ws

full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 3, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Configuration: {"stateStoring":{"enabled":false},"width":"120","height":"83","searchPanel":{"visible":false},"columnChooser":{"enabled":false},"onToolbarPreparing":"null","export":{"enabled":false},"groupPanel":{"visible":false},"grouping":{"autoExpandAll":false},"selection":{"mode":"single"},"sorting":{"mode":"none"},"allowColumnReordering":"true","rowAlternationEnabled":"true","showBorders":false,"columns":[{"headerCellTemplate":"function (element, info) {                var today = new Date();                today.setDate(today.getDate()+3);                var date = today.toLocaleDateString(undefined,{day:'2-digit'}) + ' ' + today.toLocaleDateString(undefined,{month:'short'});                var final = SW.setAttribute(element, date, 'style', 'background-color: #0072C6; color: white; border-radius: 4px; line-height: 33px; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700');                element.append(final);            }","alignment":"center","cellTemplate":"function(e, i) {                 var toDo = i.data['MoreDays2ToDo'];                var done = i.data['MoreDays2Done'];                var aux = done + ' / ' + toDo;                SW.setAttribute(e, aux, 'style', 'font-size: 15px; font-weight: 700')            }"}]}

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":1,"WidgetYPosition":20,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":7,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":1,"WidgetYPosition":16,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":7,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
	select	ucdd.Company as Companies,
			ucdd.Division as Divisions,
			ucdd.Department as Departments
	from	SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
	where	ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
)
select IsNull(count(d.Client), 0) as countLate
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) < Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) and (wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5)
		and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		and d.Company = cup.Companies

		and d.Department = cup.Departments","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Filters

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Media","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":24,"WidgetYPosition":20,"WidgetRows":4,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
	select	ucdd.Company as Companies,
			ucdd.Division as Divisions,
			ucdd.Department as Departments
	from	SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
	where	ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
)
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-5, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-5, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-5, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		and d.Company = cup.Companies
		and d.Division = cup.Divisions
		and d.Department = cup.Departments
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-4, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-4, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-4, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		and d.Company = cup.Companies
		and d.Division = cup.Divisions
		and d.Department = cup.Departments
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-3, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-3, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-3, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		and d.Company = cup.Companies
		and d.Division = cup.Divisions
		and d.Department = cup.Departments
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-2, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-2, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-2, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		and d.Company = cup.Companies
		and d.Division = cup.Divisions
		and d.Department = cup.Departments
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-1, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-1, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-1, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		and d.Company = cup.Companies
		and d.Division = cup.Divisions
		and d.Department = cup.Departments
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		and d.Company = cup.Companies
		and d.Division = cup.Divisions
		and d.Department = cup.Departments
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+1, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+1, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+1, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		and d.Company = cup.Companies
		and d.Division = cup.Divisions
		and d.Department = cup.Departments
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+2, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+2, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+2, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		and d.Company = cup.Companies
		and d.Division = cup.Divisions
		and d.Department = cup.Departments
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+3, 0) as Week,
IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+3, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+3, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		and d.Company = cup.Companies

		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+4, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+4, 0)
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and

		and d.Company = cup.Companies

		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where d.AgreedDate < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+5, 5) and d.AgreedDate > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+5, 0)
		and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and

	select	ucdd.Company as Companies,
			ucdd.Division as Divisions,
			ucdd.Department as Departments
	from	SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
	where	ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
)
select IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays3ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays3Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
where Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 4, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))
and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
        and d.Company = cup.Companies
		and d.Division = cup.Divisions
		and d.Department = cup.Departments","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Configuration: {"stateStoring":{"enabled":false},"width":"120","height":"83","searchPanel":{"visible":false},"columnChooser":{"enabled":false},"onToolbarPreparing":"null","export":{"enabled":false},"groupPanel":{"visible":false},"grouping":{"autoExpandAll":false},"selection":{"mode":"single"},"sorting":{"mode":"none"},"allowColumnReordering":"true","rowAlternationEnabled":"true","showBorders":false,"columns":[{"dataField":"countMoreDays3ToDo","headerCellTemplate":"function (element, info) {                var today = new Date();                today.setDate(today.getDate()+4);                var date = today.toLocaleDateString(undefined,{day:'2-digit'}) + ' ' + today.toLocaleDateString(undefined,{month:'short'});                var final = SW.setAttribute(element, date, 'style', 'background-color: #0072C6; color: white; border-radius: 4px; line-height: 33px; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700');                element.append(final);            }","alignment":"center","cellTemplate":"function(e, i) {                 var toDo = i.data['MoreDays3ToDo'];                var done = i.data['MoreDays3Done'];                var aux = done + ' / ' + toDo;                SW.setAttribute(e, aux, 'style', 'font-size: 15px; font-weight: 700');            }"}]}

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":24,"WidgetYPosition":2,"WidgetRows":9,"WidgetColumns":24,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
	select	ucdd.Company as Companies,
			ucdd.Division as Divisions,
			ucdd.Department as Departments
	from	SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
	where	ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
)
select v.[Name] as Client, v.Client as ClientId, v.Day, v.[HasImage], sum(v.Done) as Done, sum(v.ToDo) as ToDo
from (
select d.Client, cc.[Name], cc.[HasImage],
		case 
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate ) < Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 0
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 1
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 2
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 3
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 3, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 4
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 4, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 5
		end as Day,
		sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)) as ToDo,
		sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)) as Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [Event] e
on d.[Oid] = e.[Oid]
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
full join [CommercialClient] cc
on cc.[Oid] = d.[Client]
where e.[GCRecord] is null and d.Client is not null and 
		(d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(d.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
        and d.Company = cup.Companies
		and d.Division = cup.Divisions
		and d.Department = cup.Departments
group by d.Client, d.AgreedDate, cc.[Name], cc.[HasImage]
) as v
group by v.Client, v.Day, v.[Name], v.[HasImage]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

		IsNull(sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as TodayDone
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d

        and (d.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":24,"WidgetYPosition":11,"WidgetRows":9,"WidgetColumns":24,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with CurrentUserPermissions as (
	select	ucdd.Company as Companies,
			ucdd.Division as Divisions,
			ucdd.Department as Departments
	from	SkillUsersCompaniesDivisionsDepartments ucdd
	where	ucdd.[User] = @CurrentUserId
)
select v.[Name] as UserName, v.CreatedBy as UserId, v.Day, v.[HasImage], sum(v.Done) as Done, sum(v.ToDo) as ToDo
from (
select d.CreatedBy, u.[Name], u.[HasImage],
		case 
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate ) < Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 0
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 1
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 2
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 3
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 3, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 4
			when Convert(Date, d.AgreedDate) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 4, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 5
		end as Day,
		sum(iif(wst.[Status] = 4 or wst.[Status] = 5, 1, 0)) as ToDo,
		sum(iif(wst.[Status] > 5, 1, 0)) as Done
from CurrentUserPermissions cup, Deliverable d
full join [Event] e
on d.[Oid] = e.[Oid]
full join [WorkflowState] ws
on ws.[Oid] = d.[WorkflowState]
full join [WorkflowStateType] wst
on wst.[Oid] = ws.[WorkflowStateType]
full join [User] u
on u.[Oid] = d.[CreatedBy]
where e.[GCRecord] is null and d.CreatedBy is not null and 
		(u.[Company]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(u.[Division] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(u.[Department] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		and u.Company = cup.Companies
		and u.Division = cup.Divisions
		and u.Department = cup.Departments
group by d.CreatedBy, d.AgreedDate, u.[Name], u.[HasImage]
) as v
group by v.CreatedBy, v.Day, v.[Name], v.[HasImage]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]
